name: Toozla
description: An unique city and travel audio guide
overview:
Toozla is a mobile service that combines a global positioning system with audio tours and stories, user content, and local information, to give you an all-in-one travel guide that you can take with you everywhere.

Wherever you go, use Toozla to learn more about the famous sights and great works of art described in your conventional travel guide, or explore the cityâ€™s hidden gems â€” independent restaurants, small but exquisite parks, unique shops, theatres and museum exhibits, for example.

Would you also like to share your experiences with others? With Toozla you can record your own audio notes and commentaries everywhere, directly from your mobile.
